website_summaries.verdict: A facial exfoliator designed for men to make skin look younger and shaving smoother. Women can use it, too.
pros: Sonic technology delivers a nearly impeccable clean
A great way to clear pores and surface skin of sweat, dirt, and grime
cons: It's pricey technology, and some men may prefer a less-expensive solution

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on February 12, 2018. The item worked great, after the first charge. Two days ago I placed it back on the charger and nothing happened. I read the troubleshooting guide and it said that I should wait a few minutes, as the battery was possibly completely depleted. After one hour on the charger, there was no change. I have sent repeated emails to Foreo customer service, but they have yet to get back to me. I can't find a phone number, which is really hard to believe. $100 and just one mohth of use. I wish I could get my money back or get a replacement. Very disappointed in Foreo and their customer service on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm truly enjoying this product. I have been using twice a day for two weeks straight and I'm really feeling the difference. I've especially love to use it before I shave, it seems to lift my hairs so I can get a closer shave and my skin has been extra smooth from it. I will continue to use this twice a day (morning, and night) and if I will return with a follow up review in a few months. Also it states I should have about 50 uses from one charge and since I've charged it on day one I have yet to re-charge, so it looks like its living up to its stats so far.
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Tiny Face Scrubber - better than any brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly compact but expertly designed tool: perfect for travel, and really works well in two modes: the first powers any wash into the pores and the second helps smooth out any fine lines or wrinkles. Now it will always be packed in my toiletry bag for any kind of getaway!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Quirolgico

customer_reviews.title: Jetsetter approved! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Great facial cleanser device. I use it in the shower at the gym. Very small device is great for on the go travels and gym. Charge last extremely long.
customer_reviews.author: B. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Why would anyone.....
customer_reviews.text: For men? I’ve never met a man(or woman) that could fit this little thing in their hand. My fingers got tired trying to grip this little thing. Dumbest thing I’ve ever ordered. I honestly laughed out loud when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product to shave of e day stuble in one pass
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Foreo product ..have had a larger model ..grey unit not sure which model ..about 4 times the size of this one ..and loved it ..i recently gave it to my teenage cousins to try ..and see if it helped them with there complexions ..with the intent of getting more ..And found this model ..its a great size to take overnight or weekends ..and really works woners if you use it before shaving ..really softens hair and removes all oils making shaving a breeze ..and it still is able to do your nose and forehead for deep cleaning ..of pores ..and its black bonus
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Hall

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth
customer_reviews.text: Omg really works,on the 1 use I can tell the difference. I have bad ingrown hair and is being a salvation for me This is an update I has been using it daily and can really see a difference in my whole skin. My ingrown hair is getting way better. At my 53 yrs my skin is better than many years ago .
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Small little beast! I use this Foreo with some Natural exfoliating products and it's impressing how shinny and glowing my skin looks after each use. I usually use it before shaving and couldn't be any happier with the result with a straight blade!
customer_reviews.author: John Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product (but why is black just for men?)
customer_reviews.text: I already have a FOREO LUNA Mini in Gray "for women" but needed smaller versions for my travel and workout kits. I think these are great products, but wonder why all the products for women are super colorful (while I prefer neutrals for my devices), and I could only find black in a product directly marketed to men. I find this strange.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for travelling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. This product has change the texture of my skin, I feel it cleaner and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Yudyb

customer_reviews.title: The first product ever to actually reduce my blackheads.
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed a very significant reduction in the amount of blackheads that I got using nose strips and peel-off masks. Worth every penny! Really enjoy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Huey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sibling and they enjoy it and find it useful for keeping skin clear.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: It definitely has some kick to it. The different ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely has some kick to it. The different modes seem to require one to cycle through them to totally power off even if you don't need shave mode, for instance. The size is very compact ... making holding it sometimes difficult. The battery seems to go on forever!
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn't work much better than a rag scrubbing your face
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't work much better than a rag scrubbing your face. When contacting customer service, I was unable to receive a refund because I used the product. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: a) This is too small!!! It takes ...
customer_reviews.text: a) This is too small!!! It takes forever to use it wash your face. b) It vibrates too hard. It make my nose very uncomfortable. c) It is so expensive. My friend bought a bigger one in China which is only about $60. d) The power runs out too fast. I wash face twin a day and I have to charge it about every 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Zijie

customer_reviews.title: This is alright
customer_reviews.text: This device was alright. I gave it a fair shot using it for about six months off and on. Overall I didn't find it to be as effective as an exfoliator brush that runs for 75% cheaper than this thing. I found this was hard to use at times. I'd hold it and turn it on, start using it, then it would shut off. I'd turn it back on, start using it, and it would shut off again. At the end of the day, I wondered why I was continuing to use this when it really doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: K Dude

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you with fresh and tingly face.
customer_reviews.text: An interesting, elegant looking small device, the Foreo Luna effectively stimulates the skin and leaves your face filling tingly and invigorated. Whether it actually works as advertised, I really find hard to tell but I do like the way it makes my skin feel: fresh, clean, and tingly.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Motes

customer_reviews.title: pores look better
customer_reviews.text: I now know why it's geared for men because it doesn't remove makeup! Now, my pores look better after I use this product but make sure your face is free of makeup first. My hubby has no interest in using it so it's officially mine now. Overall, I love the brush and it's black color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Consumer

customer_reviews.title: No change in skin noticed
customer_reviews.text: Did not really notice any significant changes in skin texture or yet feel anything different. Not sure what the purpose of the light therapy is; however, I did not notice any significant change. Comes with a piece or attachment but no instructions on what it is used for. In general the directions were quite sub-par.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Beauty gadgets for men
customer_reviews.text: This compact, ergonomically designed face product is great for men. So small it can be popped in a toiletries bag for travel. Does a great job of cleansing faces.
customer_reviews.author: Mentally in Paris

customer_reviews.title: The design is sleek, compact and functional.  I like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Foreo Luna Portable Cleaning brush works well. I have been using it after I shave (about twice a week), and enjoy the compact, portable brush. The design is sleek and functional. The one thing I dislike is the charging light. I wish it projected a smaller, strobing light (more like a glow) rather then a bright (Turn signal like) light. Also, the instruction say that once the brush has a complete charge that its will project a solid light, instead it constantly blinks. Overall, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: randomartco

customer_reviews.title: I personally like it.
customer_reviews.text: I personally like it... i feel a difference in my skin texture and tone by touch. Im not sure what the light is really for tho... One charge, 2 months ago maybe and ive used it 3x a week for just a few min in a shower and its still going strong... so hats off to that tech! I add a bit of Cetaphil to it and go to town... I actually cant over do it cuz it can dry me out too much. I do suffer from oily skin and some large pores. The price point is fairly high... but again, i dig it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Smooths skin and refreshes
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time last night. For such a small item, it works very well. I applied foaming wash to my face, then used the first setting on the Foreo Luna. It gently (but effectively) worked the wash into my skin, doing a better job than I could with just my fingers. It alerted me (short pulse) when it was time to move the Foreo to another part of my face. After about 60 seconds, finished. I like the battery charging cable it came with, and the little storage tote bag. Tonight I'll the try the other setting (dry) and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Player

product_meta.title: FOREO LUNA go for MEN Portable Silicone Cleansing Brush and Anti-Aging Device
product_meta.description:
LUNA go for MEN is the perfect travel-friendly beauty companion for your busy lifestyle! With its compact size and T-Sonic technology, you can enjoy a full cleansing and anti-ageing routine whenever you want, without compromise. The Up to 8,000 T-Sonic pulsations per minute are directed through soft silicone touch-points, gently lifting away 99.5% of dirt and oil plus make-up residue, for a clear, refined and radiant complexion.

BRAND STORY
FOREO was founded in 2013 with a rebellious spirit. We thrive in making a radical difference to our customers’ everyday lives, transforming daily routines into vibrant rituals, with cutting-edge technology & sleek, modern designs
